警察学校: (けいさつがっこう) - police academy
警察官: (ケイサツカン) - policeman; policewoman; police officer
警察官職務執行法: (けいさつかんしょくむしっこうほう) - police execution of duties law
警察庁: (けいさつちょう) - National Police Agency
警察当局: (けいさつとうきょく) - law enforcement authority; police authorities; the police
警察手帳: (けいさつてちょう) - police identification card
警察機動隊: (けいさつきどうたい) - riot police; riot squad
警察沙汰: (けいさつざた) - (yoji) a matter for the police; with the police involved; a brush with the law
警察署長: (けいさつしょちょう) - head of a police station; chief of a police station; superintendent
警察証明書: (けいさつしょうめいしょ) - police certification; police clearance
警察隊: (けいさつたい) - police force; police squad
警急: (けいきゅう) - alarm; emergency; sudden contingency; alert
警戒: (keikai) - vigilância, cuidado, alerta, precaução, estar em guarda
警戒信号: (けいかいしんごう) - warning signal; restricted speed signal
警戒区域: (けいかいくいき) - hazard area (flood, tsunami, etc.); danger zone; no man's land
警戒宣言: (けいかいせんげん) - official warning (of an impending earthquake)
警戒心を解く: (けいかいしんをとく) - to let down one's guard; to relax one's guard
警戒感: (けいかいかん) - sense of caution; wariness
警戒線: (けいかいせん) - warning line; police cordon
警戒色: (けいかいしょく) - warning color; warning colour
警戒警報: (けいかいけいほう) - air-raid siren
警泥: (ケイドロ) - (abbr. of 警察と泥棒 or 刑事と泥棒) cops and robbers (hide-and-seek game)
警砲: (けいほう) - warning gun; alarm gun
警笛: (けいてき) - horn; alarm; whistle; foghorn
警策: (きょうしゃく) - (called けいさく in Rinzai Zen, きょうさく in Soto Zen)  Zen stick (used by a Zen priest to strike an inattentive Zazen sitter)/warning stick (Rinzai Zen)/encouragement stick (Soto Zen); (けいさく only) horsewhip
警視庁ハイテク犯罪対策センター: (けいしちょうハイテクはんざいたいさくセンター) - Police hi-tech crime centre
警視正: (けいしせい) - senior superintendent; police inspector
警視監: (けいしかん) - superintendent supervisor; assistant commissioner (UK, Aus. etc.)
警視総監: (けいしそうかん) - Superintendent General of the Metropolitan Police
警覚策励: (けいかくさくれい) - Zen stick (used by a Zen priest to strike an inattentive Zazen sitter)
警鐘: (keishou) - sirene de alarme, sino de incêndio; aviso, alerta
警防団: (けいぼうだん) - civil defense unit; civil defence unit
譫言: (たわこと) - nonsense; bullshit; silly things; joke
譬え: (たとえ) - (esp. 例え) example; (esp. 譬え, 喩え) simile/metaphor/allegory/fable/parable
譬える: (たとえる) - to compare; to liken; to speak figuratively; to illustrate; to use a simile
譬え歌: (たとえうた) - metaphorical poem (of the Man'yoshu); metaphorical form (of waka)
譬え話: (たとえばなし) - allegory; fable; parable
譬話: (たとえばなし) - allegory; fable; parable
議す: (ぎす) - to consult (somebody); to talk something over
議する: (ぎする) - to consult somebody; to talk something over
議に上る: (ぎにのぼる) - to come up for discussion
議了: (ぎりょう) - finishing discussion; closing a debate
議事: (ぎじ) - proceedings (e.g. parliament, congress); business (of the day)
議事堂: (ぎじどう) - assembly hall; parliament house; diet building; capitol; houses of parliament; congress hall
議事妨害: (ぎじぼうがい) - obstruction of proceedings; filibuster
議事日程: (ぎじにってい) - agenda; calendar of proceedings; order of the day
議事録: (ぎじろく) - record of proceedings; minutes
議会: (ぎかい) - congress; parliament; diet; legislative assembly
議会上院: (ぎかいじょういん) - upper house; senate
議会下院: (ぎかいかいん) - lower house (parliament, congress, diet)
議会制民主主義: (ぎかいせいみんしゅしゅぎ) - parliamentary democracy
議会政治: (ぎかいせいじ) - parliamentarism; parliamentary government
議員: (giin) - membro de uma assembleia, membro da Dieta, membro do parlamento, membro do Congresso
議員年金: (ぎいんねんきん) - legislators' pension (and retirement benefits)
議員立法: (ぎいんりっぽう) - private member's bill; legislation introduced by a Diet member
議員連盟: (ぎいんれんめい) - Diet members caucus; caucus of the Diet
議場: (ぎじょう) - assembly hall; the House
議席を失う: (ぎせきをうしなう) - to lose a seat (in an election)
議席を奪う: (ぎせきをうばう) - to unseat someone (in an election); to defeat a sitting member
議論になる: (ぎろんになる) - to get into an argument/to come to discuss; to be controversial (usu. as an adjectival phrase)/to be contentious
